item.title: Having Fun with R and Python
item.description: Introduction Python and R are both programming languages that are extremely useful for data wrangling and analysis, especially in the realm of computational biology and bioinformatics. Some examples of this can be seen below. R and Python I will be starting in R by assigning the follow string of characters to TheBestest library(reticulate) TheBestest <- "Fearless (Taylor's Version) by Taylor Swift" As we can see, Ungodly Hour is indeed the best album of 2020.
